info.name: E-Commerce API
info.description:
Welcome to the Mock E-Commerce API! ðŸš€

This API provides a comprehensive set of functionalities for managing your e-commerce platform.
Key features include:

- **CRUD**
	- Create, Read, Update, and Delete endpoints.
- **Search**
	- Find specific information with parameters and pagination.
- **Auth**
	- Verify user/admin identity.
	- Secure with Access and Refresh tokens.
- **Permission**
	- Assign roles with specific permissions.
	- Different access levels for User/Admin.
- **Validation**
	- Ensure accurate and secure input data.

For any inquiries, please contact sshah@watermelon.us


Contact Support:
 Name: Sahil Shah

item.name: Auth

request.description: This endpoint allows a user to create a new account by providing the necessary details.
This endpoint allows an existing user to log in using their credentials and receive an access token.

header.description: Refresh Token obtained from the initial login at path `response.refresh_token`.

request.description: This endpoint allows the user to refresh their access token using a valid refresh token.

header.description: Refresh Token obtained from the initial login at path `[response].refresh_token`.
Refresh Token obtained from the initial login at path `[response].refresh_token`.

item.description: Group of API calls related to authorizing the requests made to the server.

item.name: Categories
List

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a paginated list of all categories with an optional search parameter to filter by category name.
This endpoint allows an admin to create a new category.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: `Bearer`
Added as a part of security scheme: `Bearer`

item.description: Sub-group of API calls related to the read/write of the list of all categories.

item.name: Unit

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific category by its ID (in the 100s).
This endpoint allows an admin to update an existing category by its ID (in the 100s).

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: `Bearer`
Added as a part of security scheme: `Bearer`

request.description: This endpoint allows an admin to delete a category by its ID (in the 100s).

item.description: Sub-group of API calls related to the read/write of individual categories.
Group of API calls related to the CRUD of categories of products
